Title: Relates to the administration of the novel coronavirus/COVID-19 immunization
Summary: Prohibits administrative agencies from administering or requiring the COVID-19 immunization unless authorized by the legislature.
LawCode: Add ยง2184, amd ยง2164, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the administration of the novel coronavirus/COVID-19 immunization
